page.title: 09JAMES BROWN'S DAY,THAKEHAM
page.content: At 7am I opened the curtains to a beautiful morning.I went and talked to Mum for 10 minutes. I put on my{school {clothes,blue pants,grey shorts & socks {white shirt,green jumper,brown shoes. For breakfast I had a bowl of Muesli and a glass of Orange juice. I took a {Fluoride tablet. At 8.50 we opened the church door and switched on the cross light. We continued to school. 8.55 time to go into school.We got our Hymn Books and went into{Assembly.}We did{Maths & English}in the morning. 12-1pm Lunch;I had sandwiches,a crunch bar & an apple.In the afternoon we saw a{TV programme}about Egypt. Then we sang and heard a story.Home time,3.30. After school I saw a friend's pony & showed them our kitten. I changed into my{Cub Scout}uniform.At cubs we played games.I cleaned my teeth & went to bed
